fields.name: ModMail Custom Instances
fields.value:
The pricing is $60/year.
You can contact <@381998065327931392> (James [a_leon] / jrwallor) or <@365262543872327681> (SnowyJaguar) for a custom instance.
These are the benefits of a custom instance:
- Custom username, avatar and status message.
- All the [premium features](https://modmail.xyz/premium).
- No confirmation messages.
- Commands to create tickets with users.
- Requiring a command to send messages.

fields.name: Self Host ModMail
fields.value:
We do not officially support self-hosting.

However, you can [self-host the latest bot with Docker Compose](https://github.com/chamburr/modmail#self-hosting).

Alternatively, you can self-host an older version of the bot with guides [here](https://gist.github.com/waterflamev8/cab61e680e2fb5ea6027cbf144732925) and [here](https://github.com/chamburr/modmail/blob/v2.1.2/README.md#self-hosting).

fields.name: Self Host Locally
fields.value:
Any modern hardware should be sufficient for running a bot. An old computer with a few GB of RAM could be suitable, or a Raspberry Pi (any model, except perhaps one of the particularly less powerful ones).
**Note:** We don't recommend using Windows because it requires a drastic change to the scripts to support Windows file path structure, Windows can also be finicky about releasing the AVX2 instruction set which is required for ModMail to function.
